column4: Hi, I have just put a harddrive that came from a windows box in my system and was wondering how to format it for my Jaunty system
use a partitioning tool like gparted

after it's installed press Alt+F2, type gksudo gparted and hit enter to run it, then from the hard disk list at the top right corner select ur harddisk(if u already have a harddisk connected then it will be /dev/sdb), then format the partitions of the harddisk as u like :)
unlike other distros, in ubuntu there's sudo for root privilage.. you can directly open a root terminal by gksudo gnome-terminal
